QuestData.Title: Talon Watch
QuestData.Description: By now you must be wondering about all of this curse business. What could distort a majestic arakkoa into... well, into this?$B$B<Reshad drags a crooked hand through the mottled feathers about his face.>$B$BA raven is prepped and waiting to fly you to Talon Watch. There shall your eyes be opened to the origin of this curse.$B$BPresent the Eye of Anzu to Talon Guard Kurekk. He will guide you from there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Eye of Anzu to Talon Guard Kurekk in Talon Watch. Speak with Skytalon Meshaal for a flight.
QuestData.CompletionText: Reshad sent an outsider here? You must be very important... or very dangerous.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kurekk gazes at the orb.>$B$BIs that... what I think it is?$B$BWe must get this to the Talon Altar.
